title: Solar Orbiter Radio/Plasma Wave, LFR L3 plasma density derived from the spacecraft potential - M.Maksimovic (LESIA, Observatoire de Paris-CNRS)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/solar-orbiter/rpw/science/l3/bia-density/2020/solo_l3_rpw-bia-density_20200615_v02.cdf. The most common cadence occurred for 74.7027% of the 1026092 timesteps. Cadence = 62499968 [ns] = PT0.0625S.

parameters.name: DENSITY
parameters.description: Plasma density derived from probe-to-spacecraft potential and electron plasma frequency.
